thread.title: Woman killed while chasing snatch thief
thread.title_full: Woman killed while chasing snatch thief - Nation | The Star Online

author: thestar.com.my
title: Woman killed while chasing snatch thief
text:
BACHOK: A woman was killed while attempting to stop a snatch thief when she lost control of her motorcycle during a high-speed chase and smashed into a concrete pole near Kampung Pak Elong here . 
In the incident which happened at 8.15am on Wednesday, 45-year-old Siti Rohani Wahab (pic) chased a motorcyclist who snatched her handbag from her motorcycle's basket. 
"She then gave chase and rammed into an electricity pole when she lost control during the 800-meter case," said state deputy police chief  Senior Assistant Commissioner Din Ahmad.
He added that the case is being investigated under Section 41(1) of the Road Transport Act and promised to track the suspect down within 24 hours. 
"I want to advise the public not to apprehend snatch thieves.  Her death could have been avoided if she did not give chase," said SAC Din.
